PropertyList.name: Dashboard: Chinese
PropertyList.description:
huan ying kai che
zhe ge jiao cheng gei ni duan zan de shuo ming yi bias pan de gong neng.

step.message: huan ying show kan followme e-tron de jiao cheng
xu yao xian shi kai guan shi, qing dao FollowmeEV > Show Options xiang mu lan zhong da gou
zuo bian de kai guan kong zhi zhi shi deng
you bean de kai guan kong zhi jing shi deng
dang kai guan chong shang shi, deng shi kai de
jiao yuan chu zai yi bias ban shang de an niu shi fa dong ji qi dong jian, ke yi qi dong fa dong ji.
zai qian jing li hui se de an niu shi qi di jian
ta ke yi rang qi che ming di, shi yi shi ta ba
zu bian de yi qi shi che su biao. Ta gao su ni ni de su du
zhi zhen zhi xiang de fang xiang shi ni de su du.
you bian de yi qi shi dian liang biao. Bu yao rang zhi zhen zhi Xiang 0!
yi biao pan jiu shi zhe yang le
ru xu yao geng duo bang zhu, qing cha kan qi ta liang ge jiao cheng.
zhu ning jia shi yu kuai!
